hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#run the script that collect all files and creates tarball #This script purpose is to create an Upgrade tarball from a given version
#verify argument was provided #if [ $# -eq 0 ] # then # echo "Please supply Version Name (e.g. 7.0.21.0)" >&3 # exit #fi
# set logger ############### exec 3>&1 4>&2 trap 'exec 2>&4 1>&3' 0 1 2 3 exec 1>aws_createUpgradeTarball_log.out 2>&1 # Everything below will go to the file 'aws_createUpgradeTarball_log.out':
#VERSION_NAME=$1
# Artifactory location artifactoryServer=https://artifactory artifactoryRepo=libs-release-local
#create folders: /home/upgrade if [ ! -d "/home/upgrade" ]; then echo -e "\n"|sudo -S mkdir /home/upgrade fi
#download all 4 war files wars=( TopologyManagement RoutingManager arm-frontend ARM-UI ) for i in "${wars[@]}" do url=$artifactoryServer/$artifactoryRepo/com/ac/arm/$i/$VERSION_NAME/$i-$VERSION_NAME.war wget --no-check-certificate $url done
#rename war files to a VM war name (not the same as in artifactory) mv TopologyManagement-*.war ARM.war mv RoutingManager-*.war RoutingManager.war mv ARM-UI-*.war ARM-UI.war mv arm-frontend-*.war arm-frontend.war
echo -e "\n"|sudo -S cp *.war /home/upgrade
#copy upgrade.pl file from common folder echo -e "\n"|sudo -S cp $WORKSPACE/ArmCommon/Common/src/main/resources/upgrade/upgrade.pl /home/upgrade #copy perl files echo -e "\n"|sudo -S cp $WORKSPACE/ArmCommon/Common/VMFiles/Router/usr/local/bin/*.pl /home/upgrade #copy conversions folder echo -e "\n"|sudo -S cp -R $WORKSPACE/ArmCommon/Common/src/main/resources/upgrade/conversions /home/upgrade
#create ComponentVersions.txt V=$(git log --pretty=format:"%d" . |grep "tag: RoutingManager" |sed -r 's/^.*RoutingManager-([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+).*$/\1/' |while read line ; do if [[ $line =~ \.0$ ]]; then lastZero=$line; else echo $lastZero; break; fi; done) echo -e "\n"|sudo -S echo "RoutingManager=$V" >> /home/upgrade/ComponentVersions.txt
V=$(git log --pretty=format:"%d" . |grep "tag: TopologyManagement" |sed -r 's/^.*TopologyManagement-([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+).*$/\1/' |while read line ; do if [[ $line =~ \.0$ ]]; then lastZero=$line; else echo $lastZero; break; fi; done) echo -e "\n"|sudo -S echo "TopologyManager=$V" >> /home/upgrade/ComponentVersions.txt
V=$(git log --pretty=format:"%d" . |grep "tag: common" |sed -r 's/^.*common-([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+).*$/\1/' |while read line ; do if [[ $line =~ \.0$ ]]; then lastZero=$line; else echo $lastZero; break; fi; done) echo -e "\n"|sudo -S echo "ArmCommon=$V" >> /home/upgrade/ComponentVersions.txt
git clone ssh://jenkins@gerrit:29418/ARM/arm-frontend.git git clone ssh://jenkins@gerrit:29418/ARM/ARM-UI.git
cd $WORKSPACE/arm-frontend V=$(git log --pretty=format:"%d" . |grep "tag:" |sed -r 's/^.*([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+).*$/\1/' |while read line ; do if [[ $line =~ \.0$ ]]; then lastZero=$line; else echo $lastZero; break; fi; done) echo -e "\n"|sudo -S echo "arm-frontend=$V" >> /home/upgrade/ComponentVersions.txt cd $WORKSPACE/ARM-UI V=$(git log --pretty=format:"%d" . |grep "tag:" |sed -r 's/^.*([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+).*$/\1/' |while read line ; do if [[ $line =~ \.0$ ]]; then lastZero=$line; else echo $lastZero; break; fi; done) echo -e "\n"|sudo -S echo "ARM-UI=$V" >> /home/upgrade/ComponentVersions.txt
#create tar.gz cd $WORKSPACE echo -e "\n"|sudo -S tar czfP upgrade_$VERSION_NAME.tar.gz /home/upgrade
rm -rf $WORKSPACE/arm-frontend rm -rf $WORKSPACE/ARM-UI
